nl.tudelft.jpacman.board

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.jpacman.board.Unit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NPC, Pellet, Player

    public abstract class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
    A unit that can be placed on a Square.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Unit()
      Creates a unit that is facing east.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Direction getDirection()
      Returns the current direction this unit is facing.
      abstract Sprite getSprite()
      Returns the sprite of this unit.
      Square getSquare()
      Returns the square this unit is currently occupying.
      protected boolean invariant()
      Tests whether the square this unit is occupying has this unit listed as one of its occupiers.
      void leaveSquare()
      Leaves the currently occupying square, thus removing this unit from the board.
      void occupy(Square target)
      Occupies the target square iff this unit is allowed to as decided by Square.isAccessibleTo().
      void setDirection(Direction newDirection)
      Sets this unit to face the new direction.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Unit

        protected Unit()
        Creates a unit that is facing east.

    • Method Detail

      • getDirection

        public Direction getDirection()
        Returns the current direction this unit is facing.
        Returns:
        The current direction this unit is facing.

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(Direction newDirection)
        Sets this unit to face the new direction.
        Parameters:
        newDirection - The new direction this unit is facing.

      • getSquare

        public Square getSquare()
        Returns the square this unit is currently occupying.
        Returns:
        The square this unit is currently occupying, or null if this unit is not on a square.

      • occupy

        public void occupy(Square target)
        Occupies the target square iff this unit is allowed to as decided by Square.isAccessibleTo().
        Parameters:
        target - The square to occupy.

      • leaveSquare

        public void leaveSquare()
        Leaves the currently occupying square, thus removing this unit from the board.

      • invariant

        protected boolean invariant()
        Tests whether the square this unit is occupying has this unit listed as one of its occupiers.
        Returns:
        true if the square this unit is occupying has this unit listed as one of its occupiers, or if this unit is currently. not occupying any square.

      • getSprite

        public abstract Sprite getSprite()
        Returns the sprite of this unit.
        Returns:
        The sprite of this unit.
